content.question: A windmill blade with a rotational inertia of <math alttext="6.0 kilogram meters squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>kg</mi><mo>Â·</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math> has an initial angular velocity of <math alttext="8 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>rad/s</mtext></math> in the clockwise direction. It is then given an angular acceleration of <math alttext="4 radians per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>rad/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math> in the clockwise direction for <math alttext="10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn></math> seconds. What is the change in rotational kinetic energy of the blade over this time interval?

choices.label: <math alttext="48 joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>48</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>
<math alttext="192 joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>192</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>
<math alttext="4800 joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4800</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>
<math alttext="6720 joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6720</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="6720 joules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6720</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi></math>

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
